# Enclosed Trailer – 16 feet Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

* **Contract Number**: cb-5233-77505700
* **Amendment Number**: 9
* **Solicitation Number**: 202300757
* **Publication Date**: May 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 8, 2023 (14:00:00)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 11, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 1, 2023

## Tender Information

* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Tender Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

## Goods and Services

* **Goods/Services**: Enclosed Trailer – 16 feet (Remorque fermée – 16 pi)
* **UNSPSC Code**: 25181700 (Product and material trailers (Remorques pour marchandises et matériaux))
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (CDD) (C - CDD)

## Trade Agreements

* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) (Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC))
* **Regions of Delivery**: Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada

## Contractor Information

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (Gendarmerie royale du Canada)
* **Address**: 4225 Dorchester, Westmount, Quebec, H3Z 1V5, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Jed Ben Aoun
* **Email**: Jed.BenAoun@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (438) 945-8136

## Tender Documents

The tender documents and attachment can be found at the following links:
English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5233/rfp---enclosed-trailer---16-feet.pdf>
French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5233/demande-de-propositions---remorque-fermee---16-pi.pdf>
